alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 10:34PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Baldwin, west central Warren, eastern Putnam, Hancock, southeastern Greene and southwestern Taliaferro Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1034 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Reynolds at Lake Oconee to near Shoulderbone to near Oconee Springs Park to near Plant Harlee Branch, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Sparta, Crawfordville, White Plains, Siloam, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Liberty, Meriwether, Springfield, Veazey, Devereux, Beulah, Oconee Springs Park, Rockville, Powelton, Plant Harlee Branch, Shoulderbone, Alexander Stephens Park and Culverton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Greene; Hancock; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren
